What Is It?¶

A Python library to make preprocessing of RNAseq files more convenient

Changelog¶

Version 0.2.0 - Complete overhaul of program structure - Modular Workflow creation - Addition of command line arguments - Removal of PyQT dependency - Addition of unit testing

Version 0.1.1 - Added timestamps to logging and additional parameters to fastq-mcf

Version 0.1.0 - Initial alpha release
